\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}

\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}

\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}

\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{

 $ \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} ,\, \ottmv{z} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\otttype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{type}  ,\ \ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{int}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{t}}{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; \ottnt{t}}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottvar}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{var}  ,\ \ottnt{v}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottbounds}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{bounds}  ,\ \ottnt{bs}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{bnil}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottwork}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{work}  ,\ \ottnt{w}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottnt{bs'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottworklist}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{worklist}  ,\ \ottnt{wl}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{wnil}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{w}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{wl_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{++}  \ottnt{wl_{{\mathrm{2}}}}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottformula}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{formula}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{judgement}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottMonotype}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{Monotype}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottInWorklist}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{InWorklist}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{v} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottInScope}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{InScope}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottAlgorithmeticSubtyping}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{AlgorithmeticSubtyping}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottjudgement}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{judgement}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{Monotype}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{InWorklist}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{InScope}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{AlgorithmeticSubtyping}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\otttype\ottinterrule
\ottvar\ottinterrule

\ottwork\ottinterrule

\ottformula\ottinterrule

\ottjudgement\ottinterrule
\ottuserXXsyntax\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defns Monotype
%% defn mono_type
\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXtvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_mono\_tvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXtexvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_mono\_texvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_mono\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
\ottpremise{\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
\ottkw{mono} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_mono\_arrow}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnmonoXXtype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottkw{mono} \, \ottnt{t}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXtvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXtexvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXmonoXXarrow{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsMonotype}{
\ottdefnmonoXXtype{}}

% defns InWorklist
%% defn in_wl
\newcommand{\ottdruleiwlXXhereXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{iwl\_here\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleiwlXXthereXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{w}}{%
{\ottdrulename{iwl\_there\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleiwlXXhereXXextvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottnt{bs'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{iwl\_here\_extvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleiwlXXthereXXextvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{w}}{%
{\ottdrulename{iwl\_there\_extvar}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefninXXwl}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{v} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleiwlXXhereXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleiwlXXthereXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleiwlXXhereXXextvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleiwlXXthereXXextvar{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsInWorklist}{
\ottdefninXXwl{}}

% defns InScope
%% defn in_scope
\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXhereXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_ins\_here\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXhereXXextvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottkw{in} \, \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottnt{bs'}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_ins\_here\_extvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXthereXXw}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}%
}{
\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{w}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_ins\_there\_w}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefninXXscope}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXhereXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXhereXXextvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXinsXXthereXXw{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsInScope}{
\ottdefninXXscope{}}

% defns AlgorithmeticSubtyping
%% defn wl_reduction
\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfoldXXlnil}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{bnil}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottnt{bs'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redextvar\_unfold\_lnil}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfoldXXunil}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottkw{bnil}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redextvar\_unfold\_unil}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfold}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{bs}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottnt{bs'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redextvar\_unfold}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{int}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottkw{int}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXtvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_tvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXextvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{x}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_extvar}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXforallL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{bnil}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{<=}  \ottkw{bnil}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottsym{\mbox{$\uparrow$}}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_forallL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXforallR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{,}  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottkw{forall} \, \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{.}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_forallR}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{->}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXextvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}}%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{]}}%
}{
\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{<:}  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{la\_wl\_redsub\_extvar}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnwlXXreduction}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}-}  \ottnt{wl}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfoldXXlnil{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfoldXXunil{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredextvarXXunfold{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXtvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXextvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXforallL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXforallR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulelaXXwlXXredsubXXextvar{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsAlgorithmeticSubtyping}{
\ottdefnwlXXreduction{}}
